node.title: I joined PerlMonks because I wanted to learn about Perl, but now I stay because...
node.choices: I want to learn about Perl I like to teach people about Perl I found a case of the most excellent red in the cellar, and I ain't leaving till it's empty (hic!) I'm a member of the Illuminati, and I know where you live! It's a great pick-up joint I haven't got my pony yet! I dropped my car keys somewhere and I can't find them I'm addicted to the ChatterBox I've become an [XP whore] I'm waiting for [paco]'s next question Other
